name: Secret of the Corral
description:
SECRET OF THE CORRAL

This game was made live on Twitch.TV/StephenGeorg on August 26th, 2020, over the course of 10 hours. The audience could submit words/ideas which had to be used in the final game. It's full of community in-jokes and other insanity.  The goal was to "finish creating a game in one sitting", which was successful. Between the end of stream and uploading here, a few little Easter eggs were added. Good luck finding them!

You can either play right in the browser on this page, or download versions for PC/Mac. The browser version runs a little slower but doesn't require a download.
